vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
νεφρ-ός, ὁ,
in plural, kidneys, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: rarely in singular, [LXX+4th c.BC+]. (Cf. OHG. nioro 'kidney', Praenest. nefrones, Lanuv. nebrundines 'kidneys', 'testicles'.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
mind
mind, the part of the inner person that feels, desires, and gives intent; a figurative extension of the kidney (not found in the NT); a kidney;, plural νεφροι, the kidneys, reins; from the Hebrew the reins regarded as a seat of desire and affection, Rev. 2:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 腎臟
2) 用以比喻心靈深處的思維 (啟 2:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 肾脏
2) 用以比喻心灵深处的思维 (启 2:23)
